description: When Tyler showed up for his interview and almost immediately offered a tour of his tattoos, which start on his shoulder, work there way down his side and wrap around to criss cross his thighs, I knew he was a natural for the camera. That turned out to be an understatement.Fresh out of a 4 year stint in the corps,  his body is rock solid, his hormones are on overdrive and his thick slab of a cock was standing at attention. Not only does he like being watched while in action, he has a desire to be an adult film star. As you will hear in his biography, this first photo session is about the only thing he hasn't done yet and who better then us to nab that cherry and capture it on film. While other Marines may be ?the few and the proud,? this Marine is more ?the hot and the horny? and it's difficult to tell who enjoyed that tactical assault of sperm he launched on those abs more...him or me!
title: Marine Meat, Scene #02
